summary: This document is an email dated August 6, 2020, containing a list of press clippings compiled by the SDNY (Southern District of New York). It references multiple news articles covering topics related to the Epstein case, including Ghislaine Maxwell, Prince Andrew, and Michael Cohen, as well as other legal and political matters.

persons.name: Michael Cohen
persons.context: Mentioned in a press clipping headline, appears to be a subject of news coverage.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced in a press clipping headline, likely Ghislaine Maxwell, in relation to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned in a press clipping headline regarding victims' claims and being portrayed as a 'puppet of himself'.

keyFacts: The document is an SDNY internal email compiling press clippings from August 6, 2020.
It shows ongoing media coverage of figures connected to the Epstein case, including Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew.
Michael Cohen, former attorney to Donald Trump, is also listed among the news topics, indicating a mix of high-profile legal matters.
The clippings come from major news outlets like the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Washington Post, and Daily Beast.
The document itself does not contain detailed case information but demonstrates the scope of media interest monitored by the SDNY.
